title: House of Marley EM-JA006-MI Get Together Portable Bluetooth Audio System
description: The House of Marley Get Together Portable Bluetooth Audio System features amazingly detailed audio performance from the two-channel, two-way design. The Get Together system is housed in a custom-tuned bass-reflex enclosure with a solid bamboo baffle and REWIND covered rear housing. The Get Together is powered by internal 8-hour lithium ion battery so you can bring your music on the go. Bluetooth wireless connectivity allows simple and easy linking to hundreds of personal audio devices, so you can play your music wirelessly from your iPhone, iPad, iPod, Android, or any other device with Bluetooth capability.
